items.desc: Updated combined News & Event Calendar page with new layout and bright cyan text highlights.
Added tooltip support for menu items for better user guidance.
Corrected sunrise and sunset time styling to use bold font weight.
Added Durga Puja Nirghanta 2025 timeline with bilingual English/Bengali toggle.
Integrated dynamic countdown badge for Durga Puja Nirghanta that updates and persists across language switches.
Enhanced countdown badge styling for better readability and consistent festive theme colors.
Added smart search functionality to Glossary with real-time filtering by term or description.
Implemented 'Did You Mean' suggestions using Levenshtein distance for better user assistance.
Glossary now includes toggleable A–Z / Z–A sorting and sticky alphabet filters with responsive layout.
Enhanced Glossary UI with vibrant orange gradient background and subtle shadows for better aesthetics.
Improved accessibility with ARIA live regions, focus management, and semantic markup.
Scroll-to-top button now floats above footer and auto-hides to avoid overlapping on small screens.
'Get in Touch' menu has been removed from the Menu.
Added FAQ, Contact Us, Glossary, and Home buttons to the header container with improved wording for better clarity and user experience.
Enhanced header navigation structure for easier access to key sections.
Implemented an intelligent chatbot feature enabling natural language search and dynamic responses within the FAQs section.
Enhanced FAQs with chatbot integration for a more interactive and user-friendly experience.
Optimized chatbot responses to deliver accurate, context-aware information quickly.
